bill_title: amend the requirements to notify a law enforcement officer after an accident has occurred.

bill_versions.bill_text: An Act to amend the requirements to notify a law enforcement officer after an accident has occurred. Be it enacted by the Legislature of the State of South Dakota: Section 1. That § 32-34-7 be AMENDED: 32-34-7. The driver of any motor vehicle involved in an accident resulting in bodily injuries or death to any person or property damage to an apparent extent of one two thousand dollars or more to any one person's property or two four thousand dollars per accident shall immediately, by the quickest means of communication, give notice of the accident to the nearest available law enforcement officer who has jurisdiction. A violation of this section is a Class 2 misdemeanor.
